Course Content: This course aims to give basics of  Artificial Neural Networks in an algorithmic approach. The following topics are to be covered in the course: Biological and Artificial Neurons, Perceptron Training Algorithm, Multilayer Perceptron and Back Propagation Training Algorithm, Hopfield Network as Autoassociative Memory, Bidirectional Associative Memory, Function Interpolation and Radial Basis Function Networks, Kohonen Self Organizing Feature Maps, Hopfield Network for Optimization Problems, Simulated Annealing and Boltzman Machine.
